definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
Council on Foreign Relations (US policy think tank)
pinyin: Wai4 jiao1 Guan1 xi4 Li3 shi4 hui4
jian4 li4 zheng4 shi4 wai4 jiao1 guan1 xi4

sentences.english: The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.
sentences.chinese: 两国外交关系已经断绝。

sentences.english: We must fight the urge to revamp our diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须极力修补我们的外交关系。

sentences.english: EX: Pandas is of great significance in the establishment of diplomatic relations with other countries.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在我国与其他国家建立外交关系上意义非凡。

sentences.english: The two sides would like to see the normalisation of diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 双方都愿意看到外交关系的正常化。

sentences.english: On 1 January 1979 China and the United States formally established diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 中美两国于一九七九年一月一日正式建立外交关系。

sentences.english: Chapter 1, the diplomatic relation between Liao Dynasty and Korea in tenth century.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，十世纪高丽与辽之外交关系。

sentences.english: Japan still carries a lot of old diplomatic baggage in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 日本在亚洲的外交关系有厚厚一笔老账要翻。

sentences.english: Restoration of diplomatic relations between the US and Cuba is in the common interests of the two countries and the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 古美恢复外交关系符合两国和两国人民的共同利益。

sentences.english: Egypt and Iran are to hold talks with the goal of renewing full diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 埃及与伊朗研商恢复两国全面外交关系的愿景。

sentences.english: As a result, the United States re-opened diplomatic ties with Libya.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美国重启与利比亚的外交关系。

sentences.english: Will the case become a problem of the Sino-British relations?
sentences.chinese: 阿克毛案是否将成为中英外交关系的一个问题？

sentences.english: That led the British government to break off diplomatic relations with the regime.
sentences.chinese: 这使得英国和利比亚政权断绝了外交关系。

sentences.english: World expos are about tourism, trade, relations and culture.
sentences.chinese: 世博会涉及旅游，贸易，外交关系及文化。

sentences.english: After war began , the two countries broke off diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 战争一旦正式开打，两国就中止了外交关系。

sentences.english: Thirty-four years ago today, the forerunners of our two countries started the diplomatic relations between China and the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 34年前的今天，我们的先辈们开启了中菲外交关系。

sentences.english: In 1972, the two countries established diplomatic relations at ambassadorial level.
sentences.chinese: 1972年，中英建立了大使级外交关系。
